Box.Shared.Description:
Beware of critters inside.
Use this trinket to open an inventory ({0} slots), trinkets placed inside will be equipped.
Opossum.Description: Marlon introduced me to a skilled and resourceful opossum, she's working hard for her 36 children.
Opossum.Chatter.0.0: Hello! I'm the Pack Possum. I'll shake trees and bushes, collect forage, and carry your stuff.
Opossum.Chatter.0.1: You can open my pack with the "Open Tinker Inventory" key. (default RightAlt & OemPeriod, or LeftStick & ControllerX, set via TrinketTinker's GMCM)
Opossum.Chatter.0.2: You can also talk to me with the "Do Interaction" button, though I'm not very talktive. (default LeftAlt & MouseRight, or LeftStick & ControllerA, set via TrinketTinker's GMCM)
Opossum.Chatter.0.3: If you forgot to take your things before I leave, don't fret! They will be safely delivered to the lost and found.
Opossum.Chatter.4: Your grandpa was a good man, hired me a few times.
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.name: Early Trinket Slot
config.EarlyTrinketSlot.description: Enable trinket slot early, which also make trinkets drop from monsters early. This option takes 1 save/load to change, and if you forgot your trinket, it takes another day before it will appear in the lost and found.
